content: **pattern notes** this beautiful cowl features simple stitchwork with a dramatic effect the crimson cowl drapes comfortably around your neck and shoulders worked up in cashmere lusso it is truly a luxury this cowl is worked in the round in one piece from the top down the pattern is both written and charted for your convenience **finished measurements** lower circumference 42 upper circumference 25 depth 8 **materials** **fibra natura** *cashmere lusso* 50% virgin cashmere wool 50% recycled cashmere wool 50g/246 yds 10041 anthurium 1 skein hook us h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** 15 sts x 18 row = 4 in single_crochet
